__e: And I know that you were angry that I lied to you about who I was, but... Hell, do you blame me?
Look, I may have lied to you about a lot of things, but not something this big.
You have every right to be mad at me, and I'm sorry that I lied to you, but...
Even though it was you who lied to me about who you were, you still don't know who I am.
Because you wanted me to be a Young Master not a son of a thief you and him have lied to me.
Listen, um... I'm not happy about you lying to me, But I think what we have is real, and...
Because you're about to learn the hard way that I may have lied to Louis about this once, but I am never, never gonna do it again.
Listen, um... I'm not happy about you lying to me, But I think what we have is real, and...

the only reason I lied to you was because I like you... and I wanted to be with you.

but... right now I'm just so mad at my dad for lying to me.

the only reason I lied to you was because I like you... and I wanted to be with you.

I could have lied and said you look fantastic and just let you walk right out that door, but I love you too much to do that.
